alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 11:08PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow will continue heavy at times tonight prior to tapering Wednesday morning. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, locally higher especially in the Park City and Ogden Valley areas. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Southwest Wyoming. In Utah, Wasatch Back and Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions will continue on all routes tonight prior to gradually improving Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Back
